description:
This app allows you to read the King James Version Holy Bible and all Rev. William Marrion Branham sermons (audio and text) hosted at Living Word Broadcast. Additional features include KJV Bible and WMB Sermon Search and LWB's Christian Broadcast streams. For more information, visit our website at http://www.lwbcast.org/. 

For best results, we recommend you have an active internet connection when using this application. Some support for offline access is available. Future updates will expand offline access support. 

Please feel free to email us with any questions or suggestions. We trust that this will be a blessing to you. God Bless.
versionNote:
Highlighting/Bookmarking for KJV Bible Text & WMB Sermon Text 
Improved ability to copy portions of the KJV Bible Text and WMB Sermon Text to other apps (such as email or messaging) 
Addition of more sermons, including sermon text for LWB Prayer-Healing Line Segments 
Addition of Dutch and Russian language streams 
Search optimizations, with better ranking of search results 
Download multiple audio files for offline use by year 
Subtitles for Swahili and Dutch for William Branham videos 

Note: If you've already enabled offline text access in a previous version, you will have to reinstall offline content due to changes with the application.
